Create summary: The test suite for core components of NeMo, covering configuration utilities, distributed checkpoint handling, experiment manager, file I/O, neural types, optimizers/schedulers, save/restore, serialization, Torch JIT scripting, and type checking. Business intent: Ensure reliability and correctness of core functionalities, catch regressions, validate integration with PyTorch Lightning, etc. Keywords list accordingly.
